section.heading: Costs recoverable by the District of Columbia.
section.text: Costs recoverable by the District of Columbia under § 8-1442 shall include all costs related to:

para.text: Containment of the gasses, explosives, and materials identified in § 8-1442;
Necessary cleanup and restoration of the site and the surrounding environment;
Removal of the gasses, explosives, and materials identified in § 8-1442;

Such actions as may be necessary to monitor, assess, and evaluate the release or threat of release of any of the gasses, explosives, and materials identified in § 8-1442, or to mitigate damage to the public health or welfare that may otherwise result from a release or threat of a release;
Reimbursement for private collection firm’s services, when used; and
Applicable interest on all costs and expenses incurred.
